product_name: HP 15.6 inch Laptop Intel Processor N200 4GB RAM 128GB UFS Scarlet Red (12-mo. Microsoft 365 included)
short_description: Say hello to the most reliable PC that easily passes the vibe check. HP 15" Laptop is built with dependable technology, next-level power, and rock-solid performance that turns your to-do lists into to-done lists. Go from shopping to streaming to keeping up with friends all at the speed of fun. With HP PCs, you get more ‘oomph’ from your computer with less ‘oof’ from your wallet, so you can take on today with tech built for tomorrow. The HP 15.6" Laptop PC empowers you to do more with the reliable power of an Intel Processor, plus fast storage, and powerful graphics in a sleek, thoughtfully designed device. Created for wherever the day takes you and built with ocean-bound and post-consumer recycled plastics, it’s easy to show some love for the planet.

product_name: ASUS Vivobook 15.6” FHD PC Laptop, Intel i3-N305, 8GB, 256GB, Windows 11, Green Grey, E1504GA-WS34
short_description: ASUS Vivobook Go 15 is lightweight and compact. It’s designed to make you productive and keep you entertained wherever you go. With its 180° lay-flat hinge, physical webcam shield and loads of thoughtful design features, Vivobook Go 15 is the laptop that sets you free on the go.  Vivobook Go 15 OLED is powered by an Intel® Core™ i3-N305 processor, 8 GB of speedy DDR4 memory and 256 GB of storage to help you complete all your productivity missions.

product_name: Acer Aspire 3, 15.6" FHD, Intel Core i3-N305 UHD Graphics, 8GB LPDDR5, 128GB UFS, Windows 11 Home in S mode, Silver, NX.KPTAA.001
short_description: Choose the ready-to-go Aspire 3 with the Intel Core i3 processor and Intel UHD graphics inside - made for performance and productivity. With ease-of-use at its core, this family-friendly laptop is ready when you are. With Windows 11 Home in S mode, you’ll experience fast start-ups, a familiar yet expanded Start menu, and great new ways to get stuff done. And with automatic updates enabled, you get all the latest features and security hassle-free. Work, play and share all in one device!

product_name: Lenovo Ideapad Flex 5 16 inch WUXGA IPS Touch 2-in-1 Laptop AMD Ryzen 7-7730U 16GB RAM 512 SSD Arctic Grey
short_description: Whatever you're doing or wherever you are, you can count on the smart and 360-degree convertible IdeaPad Flex5 to seamlessly adapt to you with its tough-tested drop-down hinge which offers more ergonomic typing by lifting up the keyboard, and the latest AMD Ryzen 7 7730U processor and full-function Type-C port. Find yourself lost in the story with a taller 16:10 WUXGA display, and see it from anywhere with minimal eye strain with 300 nits brightness and TÜV certification.

product_name: ASUS Chromebook CM30 10.5 inch WUXGA Touch 2-in-1 Tablet MediaTek 520 8186 8GB RAM 128GB eMMC Stylus Included Fog Silver
short_description: ASUS Chromebook CM30 Detachable is the perfect portable companion for study, work, and play, with a versatile 2-in-1 design that allows it to transform seamlessly between laptop and tablet. Built to military-grade standards, it also features a free-angle adjustable stand cover and full-size detachable keyboard — all to facilitate productivity, flexibility and comfort. A 2-way push-pop garaged stylus and dual camera enable creativity, and up to 12 hours* of battery life allows the user to explore the world without limits.      *Battery life may vary based on device and upon usage and other conditions.

product_name: Apple MacBook Air 13.3 inch Laptop - Space Gray, M1 Chip, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage
short_description: Introducing The 13-inch MacBook Air with the Apple M1 chip is incredibly thin and light with a silent fanless design. It delivers remarkable performance and up to 18 hours of battery life. And it has a beautiful Retina display for super sharp text and vibrant colors. Amazing performance, Unbeatable price. It's a laptop you’re going to love!
